org.cryptonode.jncryptor
Class JNCryptorFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.cryptonode.jncryptor.JNCryptorFactory

public class JNCryptorFactory
extends Object

Factory used to obtain JNCryptor instances. A different instance is available for each version of the original RNCryptor library. The most modern implementation is always available by calling: 

 RNCryptor cryptor = RNCryptorFactory.getCryptor();

If a particular version is required, it can be obtained with the getCryptor(int version) method. A full list of the available instances is obtained through the getCryptors() method.

If the required version is not known, the ciphertext can be inspected to find the correct version using the getCryptorForCiphertext(byte[]) method. This method searches for the version byte stored in the ciphertext.

Method Summary
static JNCryptor getCryptor()
          Retrieves an JNCryptor implementing the current data format (determined by seeking the implementation with the largest version number).
static JNCryptor getCryptor(int version)
          Retrieves an JNCryptor implementing the specified version number.
static JNCryptor getCryptorForCiphertext(byte[] ciphertext)
          Examines the first byte of the ciphertext, which contains a version byte.
static List<JNCryptor> getCryptors()
          Returns a list of the available JNCryptors, arranged in ascending order of version number.

Method Detail

getCryptorForCiphertext

public static JNCryptor getCryptorForCiphertext(byte[] ciphertext)
                                         throws ClassNotFoundException
Examines the first byte of the ciphertext, which contains a version byte. Returns an JNCryptor that implements the settings for that version.

Parameters:
ciphertext - the ciphertext to examine
Returns:
an JNCryptor that supports that version
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException - if the version does not correspond to a supported type

getCryptor

public static JNCryptor getCryptor()
Retrieves an JNCryptor implementing the current data format (determined by seeking the implementation with the largest version number).

Returns:
an JNCryptor

getCryptor

public static JNCryptor getCryptor(int version)
                            throws ClassNotFoundException
Retrieves an JNCryptor implementing the specified version number.

Parameters:
version - the version number. A positive number smaller than 256 (must be expressible in eight bits).
Returns:
the JNCryptor
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException - if no implementation exists for that version

getCryptors

public static List<JNCryptor> getCryptors()
Returns a list of the available JNCryptors, arranged in ascending order of version number.

Returns:
an ordered list of RNCryptors.
